name: Someone's Blowing Bubbles at the Funeral
name_original: Someone's Blowing Bubbles at the Funeral
description:
This game was initially inspired by the aesthetic and theme of The Grand Budapest Hotel directed by Wes Anderson. 

Relatives and friends of the deceased gather to make claims to their will. Depending on which character you chose, you start off with a certain amount of cards and claims to the will (represented in points). Your objective is to either have claim to the whole will or how much your heart desires. 

Someone's Blowing Bubbles at the Funeral RuleBook.pdf (small adjustment to the Rule Book you can make is that you can change the amount of points the Will starts off with if 200 points seem overwhelming. For a shorter game I'd recommend to start off with 100 points).

Game is here:

https://playingcards.io/ybxc72
